amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the amount for the ground-based midcourse missile defense system by $403 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 112-485 to reduce the amount for the ground-based midcourse missile defense system by $403 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 252 (Roll no. 269).
